name: 周素鳳
objective: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。

materials:
1. The whole class will be divided into 10 groups with 4-5 students in each group.  Every week, 3 groups will be well-prepared for the unit we’re going to cover.  Each group will be responsible for one paragraph, the task of each group-member includes (1) reading the paragraph with correct pronunciation, (2) explaining (translating) the meaning of the paragraph in Chinese, (3) summarizing the paragraph in English, (4)focusing on useful expressions and (5) raising questions about it.
2. Every student will be arranged to take TWO individual oral tests. You will be asked questions related to the unit.  Every week, two groups of students will be assigned to take the oral test.  One of the groups will take the test in class and one will be given after class.
